New Records: Messi scored his 107th and 108th international goals, moving him to joint-second on the list of top men's international scorers behind Cristiano Ronaldo
Key Match Events: Guatemala scored an own goal in the 4th minute, which Argentina quickly turned around with Messi's equalizer; Messi took and scored a penalty in the 39th minute after Valentin Carboni was fouled; Argentina dominated possession with 75% in the second half
Pre-Game Insights: The match was a final international friendly before Copa America; Scaloni used the game to test several players and experiment with different lineups
Post-Match Reflections: Scaloni praised Messi's performance and the team's resilience after a shaky start; Lautaro Martinez was highlighted for his contribution with a penalty and nearly scoring a bicycle kick; Messi acknowledged the growth of 19-year-old Valentin Carboni
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch invader reached Messi; the match was held in front of 51,713 fans; the victory showcased Argentina's readiness for Copa America
Others: The article provided context about Copa America and Messi's importance to Argentina's tournament prospects
